SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast ( (((CMON_TOTSALCREDNOTESMAN + CMON_TOTSALCREDNOTESAUTO + CMON_TOTADEDUCTCRALLDISC + CMON_TOTADEDUCTCRNOTALLDISC + CMON_TOTADEDUCTCROTHER) * 100) /(CMON_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMON_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO)) as decimal ( 14 ,3 ) ) from :4/CMON where CMON_ADMNO=:2 and CMON_CLNTNO=:1 and CMON_YEAR=:3 and CMON_CURRENCY='PLN' and (CMON_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMON_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO)>0 ;
select cast ( sum (CMON_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMON_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO) as decimal (13,2) ) from :4/CMON where CMON_ADMNO=:2 and CMON_CLNTNO=:1 and CMON_YEAR=:3 and CMON_CURRENCY='PLN' ;

select cast ( sum(CMON_TOTIFACTCOMMSCHED + CMON_TOTIFACTCOMMSCHEDADD + CMON_TOTIMINCOMM + CMON_TOTIFIXCOMM ) as decimal ( 13,2)) from :4/CMON where CMON_ADMNO=:2 and CMON_CLNTNO=:1 and CMON_YEAR=:3 and CMON_CURRENCY='PLN' ;

SELECT cast ( SUM(CMON_TOTIIFACTDEBIT + CMON_TOTIIFACTCREDIT + CMON_TOTIIFACTSURCHARGEOD + CMON_TOTIICREDCOMM + CMON_TOTIIARRANGEM + CMON_TOTIIARRANGEMCREDCOMM + CMON_TOTIISTOCK + CMON_TOTIISTOCKCREDITCOMM) as decimal (13,2) ) FROM :4/CMON WHERE CMON_ADMNO=:2 and CMON_CLNTNO=:1 and CMON_YEAR=:3 and CMON_CURRENCY='PLN' ;
